email_body:
Dear Josephine,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to bring an urgent matter to your attention regarding an important update for the SafeSecurity team.

As you may know, we have recently implemented a new security protocol to ensure the safety of our systems and data. In order to successfully complete the transition, we kindly request all team members to verify their access permissions by clicking on the link below:

Click Here

Your prompt action is greatly appreciated as it will help us maintain a secure environment for everyone at SafeSecurity.

If you have any questions or encounter any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to me or your direct supervisor, Moses Sharp.

Thank you for your cooperation and commitment to our team's security.

Best regards,

[Realistic Name]
